javadoc: The FunctionCallFixupFieldLocation class provides specific information about the Function call-fixup field within a program location.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: locationAddr
params.comment: the address of the listing location (i.e., referent code unit)

params.name: callFixupName
params.comment: the function call-fixup field text String at this location.

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: the character position within the field
